閉殻筋: (へいかくきん) - adductor muscle (of a bivalve)
閉炉: (へいろ) - closing of the fireplace in a Zen temple (first day of the 2nd month)
閉眼: (へいがん) - closing one's eyes; passing away
閉端: (へいたん) - closed end; bocca chiusa; end of wind instrument
閉篭る: (とじこもる) - to seclude oneself; to shut oneself away
閉講: (へいこう) - closing down a course or a program (school, etc.); end of a course or program (school, etc.)
閉込める: (とじこめる) - to lock up; to shut up; to imprison
閉込め症候群: (とじこめしょうこうぐん) - {med} locked-in syndrome
閉鎖式リブリーザー: (へいさしきリブリーザー) - closed circuit rebreather
閉鎖的: (へいさてき) - insular; closed; unsociable; exclusive
閉門: (へいもん) - closing of a gate; (Edo-period) house confinement
閉門蟄居: (へいもんちっきょ) - (yoji) house arrest; being placed in confinement at home
閉院: (へいいん) - adjourning the Diet or an assembly
閉館: (へいかん) - closing of a building
閉館時間: (へいかんじかん) - closing time (library, museum, etc.)
閊え: (つかえ) - load on one's chest; (支え, 閊え only) obstacle/hindrance/impediment/difficulty
閊える: (つっかえる) - to stick/to get stuck/to get caught/to get jammed/to clog; to be unavailable/to be busy/to be occupied/to be full; to be piled up (e.g. of work); to halt (in one's speech)/to stumble (over one's words)/to stutter/to stammer; to feel blocked (of one's chest or throat, due to grief, anxiety, illness, etc.)/to feel pressure/to feel pain
開いた口が塞がらない: (あいたくちがふさがらない) - to be surprising; to be shocking; to be jaw-dropping
開いた口が塞がらぬ: (あいたくちがふさがらぬ) - surprising; shocking; jaw-dropping
開いた口も塞がらぬ: (あいたくちもふさがらぬ) - surprising; shocking; jaw-dropping
開いているマーク区間宣言: (ひらいているマークくかんせんげん) - open marked section declaration
開いている実体: (ひらいているじったい) - open entity
開いている要素: (ひらいているようそ) - open element
開かる: (はだかる) - to be separated/to be exposed/to be wide open; to stand with one's limbs apart (blocking the way)
開かれたシステム: (ひらかれたシステム) - open system
開かれる: (ひらかれる) - (often as 開かれた, 開かれている)  to be open
開き: (ひらき) - opening/gap; dried and opened fish
開き直る: (ひらきなおる) - to become defiant; to turn upon; to become serious
開き鯵: (ひらきあじ) - split and dried saurel
開く: (あく) - (esp. 開く) to open (e.g. doors); (esp. 開く) to open (e.g. business, etc.); (esp. 空く) to be empty; (esp. 空く) to be vacant/to be available/to be free; (esp. 明く) to be open (e.g. neckline, etc.); (esp. 明く) to have been opened (of one's eyes, mouth, etc.); (esp. 明く) to come to an end; (esp. 明く) to open (one's eyes, mouth, etc.); to have a hole/to form a gap/to have an interval (between events)
開けっぱなし: (あけっぱなし) - leaving open/leaving ajar; outspoken/frank
開けっぴろげ: (あけっぴろげ) - unguarded; frank; open
開けっ広げ: (あけっぴろげ) - unguarded; frank; open
開けっ放し: (あけっぱなし) - leaving open/leaving ajar; outspoken/frank
開けっ放す: (あけっぱなす) - to leave open
開ける: (あける) - (開ける only) to open (a door, etc.)/to unwrap (e.g. parcel, package)/to unlock; (開ける only) to open (for business, etc.); (esp. 空ける) to empty/to remove/to make space/to make room; (esp. 空ける) to move out/to clear out; (esp. 空ける) to be away from (e.g. one's house)/to leave (temporarily); (esp. 明ける) to dawn/to grow light; (esp. 明ける) to end (of a period, season); (esp. 明ける) to begin (of the New Year); (esp. 明ける) to leave (one's schedule) open/to make time (for); to make (a hole)/to open up (a hole)
開け広げる: (あけひろげる) - to open wide; to reveal hidden contents
開け払う: (あけはらう) - to open; to vacate
開け放し: (あけはなし) - leaving open/leaving ajar; outspoken/frank
開け放す: (あけはなす) - to open wide (doors, windows, etc.); to fling open
開け放つ: (あけはなつ) - to throw open; to leave open
開け渡す: (あけわたす) - to vacate; to surrender
開会: (かいかい) - opening of a meeting
開会のことば: (かいかいのことば) - opening address
開会の言葉: (かいかいのことば) - opening address
開会の辞: (かいかいのことば) - opening address
開傘: (かいさん) - opening of a parachute
開催: (kaisai) - holding (uma conferência, exposição, etc.), opening, hosting (e.g. the Olympics)
開催国: (かいさいこく) - host country (e.g. for a conference)
開催地: (かいさいち) - place where a meeting (conference, etc.) is held; venue
開催式: (かいさいしき) - opening ceremony (of an event, show, etc.)
開創: (かいそう) - initial opening (esp. of a temple)
開口: (かいこう) - opening/aperture (e.g. camera); opening one's mouth/beginning to speak; open/broad
開口一番: (かいこういちばん) - (yoji) at the very beginning of one's speech; the first thing (one) says after opening the mouth
開口数: (かいこうすう) - numerical aperture (in photography)
開口音: (かいこうおん) - (of Chinese) pronunciation of kanji without a medial between the initial consonant and center vowel; (of Japanese) the long "o" vowel arising from combination of the "a" and "u" sounds
開国: (かいこく) - founding a country; opening of a country (e.g. Japan) to the world
開園: (かいえん) - (used for ~園) (ant: 閉園) opening, either for the day or a "grand opening" (e.g. theme park, botanical garden etc.)
開基: (かいき) - foundation of a temple/laying a foundation (stone); open base
開場: (かいじょう) - opening (the doors to an event, etc.); inauguration
開墾: (kaikon) - cultivo de novas terras, desmatamento, recuperação
開始コドン: (かいしコドン) - start codon; initiation codon
